title: Assist with a Zoning Variance Application
description: A client wants to open a restaurant in a space not zoned for it. The agent must assist them in applying for a zoning variance.

tasks.description: Research the local zoning code and the process for obtaining a variance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the specific requirements and steps for a variance application.

tasks.description: Refer the client to a specialized land-use attorney to handle the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is connected with a legal expert.

tasks.description: Provide supporting documentation for the application, such as market data showing a need for a new restaurant in the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides data to help justify the variance request.
